attributes.action: Create a department who investigates and SHUTS down puppy farms across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We have set up pages on Facebook such as No Puppy Farms UK and have plenty of evidence against these nasty profit driven organisations. All of the information is there, they need to be stopped.
attributes.background: There is a wealth of evidence against puppy farms all over the UK. They have websites, pages and are allowed to freely advertise "designer" dogs who are mistreated and in ill health when they leave. This isn't something which our country should be advocating and action needs to be taken immediately.
